name: The Ultimate Title
description:
This is "The Ultimate Title" The Game for Geo Jam!

Try to climb to the highest positions in this amazing strategy competition using all legal and illegal means but beware! You must not betray your audience!

Teamed up with :

Risko Chan for the art 

Hrantne for the music and sounds

Developed by me!

The is not finished we didnt manage to finish it all at the deadline but I will try to publish a completed version after the jam !

Please make sure to write about any bug u see and remember to have fun 

NOTE : the game has only one level working sry...
